title: SalesDiagnostics
description: Health status for the Sales application "Ruter Salg" and it peripheral connections. Diagnostics performed and reuslts sent before every stop.

eventTimestamp.description: ISO 8601, UTC. The time of this diagnostics message generation

nfcReaderConnected.description: True if the NFC reader is discovered and connected by the app

printerConnected.description: True if the printer is discovered and connected, and if the previous communication with the printer was a print operation the print was a success

printerStatus.description: Optional. If printerConnected is false, printerStatus might contain last errorMessage from printer if available, or error message from the sales device if unavailable

nodAvailable.description: True if the app can contact the NOD backend

sapiAvailable.description: True if the app can contact the SAPI backend

loggedIn.description: True if a user is logged into the app

journeyRef.description: Last received journeyRef. Obtained from last received Journey message.

stopPlaceId.description: Last received stopPlaceId. Obtained from last received NextStop message with a valid Ruter zone
